Propaganda Department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China
pinyin: Zhong1 gong4 Zhong1 yang1 Xuan1 chuan2 bu4

definition: Propaganda Department of the Communist Party of China
pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 Gong4 chan3 dang3 Zhong1 yang1 Wei3 yuan2 hui4 Xuan1 chuan2 bu4
containing_words.word: 中国共产党中央委员会宣传部

definition: Central Propaganda Department (abbr. for 中國共產黨中央委員會宣傳部|中国共产党中央委员会宣传部[Zhong1 guo2 Gong4 chan3 dang3 Zhong1 yang1 Wei3 yuan2 hui4 Xuan1 chuan2 bu4])

sentences.english: Receive alarm hind, prefectural public security bureau and department of propaganda of county Party committee undertook checking instantly.
sentences.chinese: 接警后，县公安局与县委宣传部立即进行了核查。

sentences.english: The promotion department drummed up obvious stunts.
sentences.chinese: 公关宣传部门显然耍起了引人注目的花招。

sentences.english: Once was institute propaganda department vice-minister , has the good team spirit.
sentences.chinese: 曾担任学院宣传部副部长，具有良好的团队精神。

sentences.english: The right for final interpretation of the rules of this event is reserved to the Publicity Department of the CPC Jiangmen Municipal Committee.
sentences.chinese: 中共江门市委宣传部对本活动规则有最终解释权。

sentences.english: Powerful party organs like the Organization and Propaganda Departments do not have signs outside their offices.
sentences.chinese: 档之强力机构，如组织部，宣传部门不对外公开。

sentences.english: On Nov. 4, the Central Propaganda Department banned further news of the interview.
sentences.chinese: 11月4日，中央宣传部禁止了该采访的进一步新闻。

sentences.english: Chen Zehui, director of the Publicity Department of the CPC Changsha Municipal Committee, attended the opening ceremony.
sentences.chinese: 长沙市宣传部长陈泽珲出席开幕式。

sentences.english: The phone at the publicity department of work safety bureau rang unanswered.
sentences.chinese: 安监局宣传部的电话无人应答。

sentences.english: Repeated calls to the propaganda department went unanswered on Tuesday.
sentences.chinese: 周二，记者曾多次致电医院宣传部门，均无人接听。

sentences.english: The new manage of propaganda department was really shrewd and capable.
sentences.chinese: 新来的宣传部经理的确精明干练。

sentences.english: The local county party committee propagandizes the department saying that really has its person, but the special details are not clear.
sentences.chinese: 当地县委宣传部门称，确有其人，但具体情况不清楚。

sentences.english: Then, I often met up with my friends working in the Suzhou Municipal Publicity Department and the Broadcasting Bureau.
sentences.chinese: 当时我时常和苏州市宣传部与广播局的朋友们相聚。

sentences.english: He was once Deputy Director of Propaganda Department of the CPC Shanghai Committee.
sentences.chinese: 曾任上海市委宣传部副部长。

sentences.english: Still, central government propaganda officials reserve the right to intervene.
sentences.chinese: 然而中央宣传部有权利干预节目内容。

sentences.english: English:Because of the need of work, made the council of ministers of propagating this afternoon.
sentences.chinese: 由于工作需要，今天下午开了宣传部长会议。

sentences.english: He edited its paper, Volkischer Beobachter, and became its propaganda chief.
sentences.chinese: 他负责文件工作，并成为了宣传部长。
